The structure of this folder is as follows:

All rules residing in the subdirectory 'xxx' must following the following naming convention:
xxx-TTT-BusinessRules-vvv.ods

where "TTT" is to be replaced by the transaction number (e.g. 'T10')
and "vvv" is to be replaced by the version number (e.g. 'v04')

See 'atgov' and 'atnat' for examples.



All codelists residing in the subdirectory 'xxx' must following the following naming convention:
xxx-CodeLists-vvv.ods

where "vvv" is to be replaced by the version number (e.g. 'v04')
